question: In which of the following places Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj was born?
explanation: In 1627 AD, Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj was born in the hill-fort of Shivneri, near the Junnar city in Pune district. He was the son of Shahaji Bhonsle (Maratha general) and Jijabai( the daughter of Lakhujirao Jadhav of Sindkhed).
